SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,E.* FROM (SELECT NOTICE_NO ,NOTICE_TITLE ,COUNT ,ENROLL_DATE ,MANAGER_NAME FROM TB_NOTICE N JOIN TB_MANAGER ON (WRITER_NO = MANAGER_NO) WHERE N.STATUS='Y' ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC) E) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO ,NOTICE_TITLE ,NOTICE_CONTENT ,WRITER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_NNO.NEXTVAL ,? ,? ,? )
